CustomField.description: The rule used to determine how date impacts the number of records in the schedule, and how many days should be billed in each individual record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The rule used to determine how date impacts the number of records in the schedule, and how many days should be billed in each individual record.
CustomField.label: Digital Billing Date Strategy
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Billing Schedule Rules (Digital Billing Date Strategy)
